PKGNAME=bash-5.1.16
COMMENT=The GNU Bourne Again Shell
CATEGORIES=shells
MACHINE_ARCH=x86_64
OPSYS=NetBSD
OS_VERSION=9.3
PKGPATH=shells/bash
PKGTOOLS_VERSION=20220128
SIZE_PKG=4567890
BUILD_DATE=2023-01-15 10:30:00 +0000
DESCRIPTION=Bash is an sh-compatible command language interpreter that
DESCRIPTION=executes commands read from the standard input or from a file.
DESCRIPTION=Bash also incorporates useful features from the Korn and C shells.
